 	* gnu/java/net/protocol/jar/Connection.java

@@ -211,8 +211,21 @@ protected native void connect (InetAddress i, int port) */ public native Object getOption(int optID) throws SocketException; - private native void mcastGrp(InetAddress inetaddr, NetworkInterface netIf, - boolean join) throws IOException; + /** + * Joins or leaves a broadcasting group on a given network interface. + * If the network interface is null the group is join/left on + * all locale network interfaces. + * + * @param inetAddr The broadcast address. + * @param netIf The network interface to join the group on. + * @param join True to join a broadcasting group, fals to leave it. + * + * @exception IOException If an error occurs. + */ + private native void mcastGrp(InetAddress inetAddr, + NetworkInterface netIf, + boolean join) + throws IOException; /** * Closes the socket
